snippet: The soldier defected on Saturday and said he had killed his platoon and company commanders, a South Korean military spokesman said.
abstract: North Korean Army sergeant defects to South Korea after killing his platoon and squadron leaders.
lead_paragraph: The soldier defected on Saturday and said he had killed his platoon and company commanders, a South Korean military spokesman said.

headline.seo: North Korean Soldier Crosses Demilitarized Zone to Defect, South Korea Says
headline.main: North Korean Soldier Said to Cross Demilitarized Zone to Defect
headline.print_headline: North Korean Soldier Said to Defect
